sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { FiArrowRight, FiUserPlus, FiCheckCircle, FiBookOpen } from 'react-icons/fi' const About = ({handleClick}) => { return ( <>

Hello friend! I'm a full-stack web and app developer based in Jakarta, Indonesia, formerly Southern California, USA. I have 2 years of experience with React.js and React Native (with Redux, Redux-thunk and React Context/Hooks) To add some function to my shiny front end I also have experience in Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL to complete the stack. I'm all about serverless, having worked with Firebase and Google Cloud. To avoid any mishaps and late nights troubleshooting, I'm also proficient in Jest and Appium. I'm a huge fan of lightweight and modular components with functional design in mind. I also have a pension for writing automations and workflows with Bash and Git that make my job easier.

I'm currently a full stack software engineer at GajiGesa, a startup dedicated to bringing financial and employee wellness to 60% of Indonesia's workforce. My tasks include but are not limited to building back end infrastructure for clients, and contributing to the development, maintenance and improvement of our React Native apps, GajiTim and GajiGesa. Prior to that, I worked as a data analyst at Bitvore, an AI Fintech Startup based in California, dedicated to providing business insight from unstructured data. where I wrote server-side Javascript for collecting and analyzing customer data for sentiment analysis that influenced our machine learning model.

I attribute my acquired skillset to my curiosity to solve everyday problems. My personal project Filtable (Repo), a simple REST API to CSV converter,

fulfilled a particular need for gathering valuable customer data. I sought to solve problems in my personal life as well. I built TMDb Scraper to find and rank the top 10 movies that I've seen in my life, and Visitr (Repo) to quickly find out what I should pack in my suitcase based on my destination's weather. I'm always looking for a challenge and collaborative team that puts learning and growth first. I'd love to chat! Browse my socials by clicking the links below or send me an email anytime!

) } export default About
